name: Genre Manager
overview: Automatically display movie genres on the home page as Netflix-style horizontal rows
description: A Jellyfin plugin that automatically displays movie genres on the home page as Netflix-style horizontal rows. Features automatic genre detection from your Jellyfin library, configurable genre selection and priority, support for movies and/or TV series, responsive design with hover effects, and easy navigation to genre pages.

versions.changelog: Initial release - Netflix-style genre display with automatic detection, configurable selection and priority ordering, responsive design with horizontal scrolling
